text: two questions: (1) do we have branded resources for a slide deck? and (2) should I use them for a lunch&learn talk?
I think we have an old lunch n learn deck around somewhere... <@U026PLK4S> might know where it is
Something like this <http://uncorkedstudios.com/styleguide> ?
You certainly don't HAVE to use anything specific.
<@U02618EV1> that helps, but I was hoping for more of a template I could just drop my text/images into
We've got templates that can make it easier for you, and I'm happy to point you to them.
give me 1 sec
What program are you planning on using?
ideally google slides. I think it can take ppt or key imports
i don't have indesign :/
ah. right. well, i dont think I have any keynote, or PPT templates.
If its just for internal use, just make something up!

happy to help with fonts, logos, etc, but i think most can be found on the NAS. 
NAS > Uncorked > Style Guide > ALL
it would be internal+friends I think, depending on how much we advertise the talk
i do have an Uncorked branded keynote that I can give you if it's helpful
thanks <@U026PLK4S>! I saw another resource too: NAS > Uncorked > Keynote Template. That's from 1/16/13 though
Sorry, it's ALL, not "master style guide" that has our fonts, logos (in vector and png), decks, etc
<@U0260V1BX> that would be awesome!
lemme find it
yeah, use melissa's
it's that New New
:wink:
it's massive, I'm going to remove all but a few different page styles
No design week in 2015: <http://www.designweekportland.com/>
gonna see if there are any opportunities to collaborate for 2016
theyre pushing it to the spring
Yes, it's awkward that they're skipping Spring '15. Glad it won't be conflicting with XOXO next year.
